about_the_game:
This DLC pack contains:

Free add-on: Change of season to summer + dynamic change of weather: sunny, overcast, rain, thunderstorm, storm, fog.


This expansion allows you to experience all the adventures on the summer map.

You can return to the original game at any time without losing the SaveGame!

Thank you for your support as we design the best economic action survival shooter for you. AWL team.
detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains:

Free add-on: Change of season to summer + dynamic change of weather: sunny, overcast, rain, thunderstorm, storm, fog.


This expansion allows you to experience all the adventures on the summer map.

You can return to the original game at any time without losing the SaveGame!

Thank you for your support as we design the best economic action survival shooter for you. AWL team.
name: Anarchy: Summer Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon 570 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:

Linguagem imprópria

short_description: This DLC pack contains: Free add-on: Change of season to summer + dynamic change of weather: sunny, overcast, rain, thunderstorm, storm, fog. This expansion allows you to experience all the adventures on the summer map. You can return to the original game at any time without losing the SaveGame!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
